name: Santa Claus is Coming To Town
name_original: Santa Claus is Coming To Town
description:
You are Santa and theres some kids who have done some sins so you need to "take care" of them. You climb down their chimney and need to find them, theres three children in the house, in level 2 and 3 theres more houses and the children are spread out in those houses. Also you need to find cookies and eat them before you have a heart attack, why? well ur Santa and hes fat and needs to eat all the time, also if theres a door in the way then you can break it. 

 Controls: mouse button 1 to break doors and "E" to eat food and kil- i mean take care of the children.

also uh the verse i chose was "Santa Claus is coming to town" 

also i gotta say the web version is little fuked so i woulds recomend the downloadable version, the reason why its so buggy i still dont know, i have tried to fix it but was still fuked
